tweet:
My colleague @RepMikeTurner exposed the Democrats' key talking point from today as made-up presumption rather than fact. 

Q: No one else on this planet told you that Donald Trump was tying aid to these investigations, is that correct?

A: Yes. pic.twitter.com/PRyKTPmEgw

The lack of leadership from the Natural Resources Committee @NRDems is appalling. Partisan hearings, partisan bills - all of this directed by their staff instead of elected Members of Congress. They claim bipartisanship, but it's been 11 months & I've seen no evidence to prove it

It's officially been one year since I took the oath of office and started serving Oklahoma's First District in Congress. Thank you so much for this opportunity - I look forward to many more successful years! pic.twitter.com/d98FMWiXVk
